name: Arachidonic acid:oxygen 1-oxidoreductase
definition: Arachidonate + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> 20-HETE + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O

orthologs.K07422: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily U polypeptide 1
orthologs.K17726: phylloquinone omega-hydroxylase / docosahexaenoic acid omega-hydroxylase / leukotriene-B4 20-monooxygenase [EC:1.14.14.78 1.14.14.79 1.14.14.94]
